sequence.notes: Asymmetric Michael addition of a benzofuran boronic acid to crotonaldehyde catalyzed by a MacMillan imidazolidinone organocatalyst.
Nucleophilic addition of a vinyllithium species (derived from 2,2-dimethylcyclohexanone Trisylhydrazone) to an aldehyde, forming a new C-C bond and a secondary alcohol.

Lewis acid (BBr3) catalyzed intramolecular cyclization to form the tetracyclic (+)-Frondosin B. The methoxy group on the furan is demethylated and then methylated again in the product (this is a common mechanism for BBr3 with anisole derivatives, but the product shows methoxy still, suggesting either selective reaction or re-methylation is implied, but visually the methoxy is retained). Based on the image, the methoxy group is retained.
